snippet: The rookie Jean-Gabriel Pageau scored his first N.H.L. playoff goals on his first career hat trick for the Senators.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Ottawa Senators beat Montreal Canadiens, 6-1, in emotional and fight-filled Game 3 of playoff series; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The rookie Jean-Gabriel Pageau scored his first N.H.L. playoff goals on his first career hat trick for the Senators.

headline.seo: Senators Rout Canadiens in Brawl-Filled Game
headline.main: Goals and Punches Reign as Senators Rout Canadiens
headline.print_headline: Goals and Punches Reign As Senators Rout Canadiens
